The news is overwhelming,
but it doesn"t have to be.

AccuCheck takes the stress out of your scroll! With our premium AI, AccuCheck helps you analyize the articles you read so that you can get a clearer picture of what the news is telling you.

Marks the polarity of the article. Possible values: strong positive, positive, neutral, negative, strong negative, or no polarity.
Marks the subjectivity of the article. Possible values: objective or subjective.
Marks the agreement between the sentiments in the article. Possible values: agreement or disagreement.
